See also: telefon, telefón, telèfon, and telefòn

German[edit]

Alternative forms[edit]

  • Telephon (pre-1996 spelling)

Pronunciation[edit]

  • IPA(key): /ˌteːləˈfoːn/, /ˌtɛləˈfoːn/ (traditional standard; dated in Germany)
  • IPA(key): /ˈteːləˌfoːn/ (now commonest in Germany)
  • IPA(key): /ˈtɛləˌfoːn/ (regional; including western Germany)
  • audio (Germany)
    		(file)
  • audio (Austria)
    		(file)
  • Rhymes: -oːn

Noun[edit]

Telefon n (genitive Telefons, plural Telefone)

  1. telephone

Synonyms[edit]

  • Fernsprecher (chiefly officialese)

Derived terms[edit]

  • Münztelefon
  • Telefonanschluss
  • Telefonkabel
  • Telefonverbindung
  • Telefonzelle

Luxembourgish[edit]

Noun[edit]

Telefon m (plural Telefonen)

  1. telephone
